text: Agdistis iranica is a moth in the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Iran.A new species, a new synonym, and new distribution records in the genus Agdistis Hübner, 1825 from Iran (Pterophoridae: Agdistinae) The wingspan is 17–20 mm. The forewings are grey-brown with four spots in the apical portion of the costal edge. The hindwings are greyish. ==References== Category:Agdistinae Category:Moths of the Middle East Category:Moths described in 2006
title: Agdistis iranica
